card.name: Überdragon Bajula
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts those cards into his graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Wind Axe, the Warrior Savage
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Miraculous Plague
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

card.name: Reap and Sow
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into his graveyard. Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Miraculous Snare
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

card.name: Emergency Typhoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: The Grave of Angels and Demons
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ If there are 2 or more creatures that have the same Card Name ■ Look at each player's mana zone. If there are 2 or more cards that have the same Card Name

card.name: Time Tripper, Shadow of Stagnation
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

card.name: Dreaming Moon Knife
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Pakurio
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at your opponent's hand and add a card from it to their shields face down.

card.name: Noble Enforcer
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature can't be attacked or blocked by creatures that have power 2000 or less. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, creatures that have power 2000 or less can't attack or block.

card.name: Jenny, the Dismantling Puppet
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

card.name: Ochappi, Pure Hearted Faerie
card.text: ■ Strike Back ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Crest of Mother
card.text: ■ Choose a civilization. You may put one of your creatures that has the chosen civilization from the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose a creature in your mana zone that has the same civilization as the chosen creature that costs the same as or less than than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Romanesk, the Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ End Step

card.name: Queen Alcadeias, Holy Gaia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells other than multicolored spells. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following. :► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost. :► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

card.name: Perfect Galaxy, Immortality Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Shield Force

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mil Armor, Mecha King Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Lord Reis, Wisdom Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "Blocker" into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Tensai Janit of the Hidden Blade
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hustle Castle
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. ■ If the fortified shield isn't fortified by any other castles, whenever the fortified shield would be broken by your opponent's creatures, you may return one of your other shields to your hand instead.

card.name: Rose Castle
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ Each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Huckle Kirin Sawyer, Jungle Governor
card.text: ■ Mana Evolution ■ Shield Force

card.name: Prince Avaraldo, Cavalier of Thunder
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of spells revealed in this way into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Submarine Fortress Lair
card.text: ■ Castle Fortify ■ At the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Sol Habaki, Apocalyptic Sage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Dark Sanji, Darkfang Ninja
card.text: ■ Ninja Strike ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step

card.name: Kodamanma, All-Devouring Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Terse Ruth, Lightboom Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a card in your mana zone into your graveyard, you may return that card to your mana zone.

card.name: Fire Crystal Bomb
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less. ■ Return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Persistent Prison of Gaia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. If the discarded creature has the same name as the returned creature, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Faerie Miracle
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Procyon Dragoon
card.text: ■ When you first put a card into your mana zone during your turn, you may put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. If you do, return that card to your mana zone.

card.name: Psychen Pippi
card.text: ■ Saver: file:Victory Rare.png ■ When this creature is discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put a tooltip

card.name: Cheering Pippi
card.text: ■ Your Dragons may cost 1 less to summon and your Commands may cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.
